mapper.select: select user.* from forum.symphony_user user join forum.symphony_follow follow on user.oId = follow.followerId where exists(select t1.oId from forum.symphony_follow t1 where follow.followerId = t1.followingId and follow.followingId = t1.followerId and t1.followingType = 0) and follow.followingId = #{userId} and follow.followingType = 0

select user.* from forum.symphony_user user join forum.symphony_follow follow on user.oId = follow.followerId where not exists(select t1.oId from forum.symphony_follow t1 where follow.followerId = t1.followingId and follow.followingId = t1.followerId and t1.followingType = 0) and follow.followingId = #{userId} and follow.followingType = 0
select * from symphony_user where userName = #{userName} and userPassword = #{userPassword}
